summary: Putting stuff in Requiem because I want to.
descriptionHtml:
[center]        This is a story all about how I wanted to add my favorite things to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]. [/center] 
[center]         So I'd like to take a minute just sit right there, [/center]  
[center]          I'll tell you what kind of things I'll be adding to this mod. [/center]  


[u]Currently[/u]:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26617/?]Pauldrons - Morrowind Style[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15442/?]Ingredients of Tamriel[/url]

[u]Future Plans[/u]:
None


I love Requiem - the whole Requiem Experience. Now, please don't ask why; no one quite knows the reason. It could be, perhaps, that my shoes are too tight. Or it could be that my head wasn't screwed on just right. But I think that the most likely reason of all... may have been that my mod list was two sizes too small.
                       But it seemed like it was missing something...
[quote] "How could it be so? It came without pauldrons! It came without rags!... it came without ingredients, cloaks, or bags!"[/quote][center] Then I got an idea. An awful idea. I got a wonderful, [u][i][b]awful[/b][/i][/u] idea! [center][quote][center] "I know just what to do!" [/center][/quote][/center][quote] "I'll make a compatibility patch! And I'll make it up quick!" [/quote][/center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

             ------------    [u]Pauldrons[/u]     ------------

         *   Pauldrons are distributed among bandits only. 
         *   Only up to orcish quality with a small chance of spawning.
         *   Everything else will have to be crafted.
         *   They are also enchant-able now. 

          ------------    [u]Ingredients of Tamriel[/u]     ------------

         *   Carried over ingredients in leveled lists.
         *   Increased the amount of all ingredients sold.
         *   Certain ingredients are added to creature lists such as skeever eyes and trolls blood.
author: Alabastorr
